snippet.title: STRANGER | Game/Graphics Trailer | Horror PC & VR Game - FREE TO PLAY DEMO
snippet.description:
STRANGER | Environment/Graphics Showcase | Coming this summer!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
WISHLIST NOW ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1902150/STRANGER/
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

----LORE INVOLVED-----
 Join STRANGER's discord to discuss the lore and solve the mysteries and hidden messages in this video and the game!
https://discord.gg/73eeU6pr7b

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
STRANGER is a VR and First Person LORE-driven horror game from the developer of SafeZoneVR where you will be defending your house against an unknown enemy. Make use of the provided locks and lock the windows when you hear the Stranger nearby. Make it to 6 am when the police arrive to find yourself uncovering the mystery that lies behind this STRANGER.

You can choose different levels of difficulty and choose from different maps and uncover the story of your player, the STRANGER, and more. Hidden stories and lore-driven cryptic messages will be left to be discovered.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Features: 
Immersive Experience: Realistic graphics and spatial audio will have you on your toes and your computer running well with the new UNREAL ENGINE 5 next-gen engine and RTX capability, giving you peak quality with little performance risk.

NonLinear Gameplay: The same thing will never happen twice, replayability 
and new events and an intelligent enemy will give you weeks of gameplay

Deep Story: For lore enthusiasts and mystery enthusiasts you will have to dig deep with the given information to help unravel the mystery behind the unknown STRANGER, hidden items, rare events (easter eggs), photos/trailers/audio cryptic messages to be discovered, and much more. (Join the discord community to work together: https://discord.gg/73eeU6pr7b

Much More COMING SOON! Stay tuned as new features will be implemented/experimented with before the early access launch!
